name: Cringy Character Combat!
description: This is a simplistic local multiplayer fighting game made to give me practice with controllers and multiplayer for my bigger project, 5 Star Fishy. At beta launch, it features my two favorate characters that I've made; Superworm, my comic book hero that has no relation to the book of it's name, and Fishy, the protagonist of 5 Star Fishy. I may update it to add in more fighters and stages if there is enough demand, or if I feel like it.
